text: Non - specific binding was not evident ( using agarose gel electrophoresis of PCR products ) in samples assayed in uniplex , duplex or triplex analyses . That all assays amplified the correct target region was confirmed by Sanger sequencing ( Online Resource S7 , Fig . S7 . 2 - S7 . 7 ) . The assays appear specific to the intended squirrel pathogens , as neither SQPV nor SADV qPCR assays amplified ( 0 / 6 reactions ) a product in qPCRs seeded with either cowpox , monkeypox or canine adenovirus 1 or 2 DNA .
